thread.title: American Tower to Buy Controlling Stake in Indian Cell Tower Company
thread.title_full: American Tower to Buy Controlling Stake in Indian Cell Tower Company - WSJ

author: Sean McLain
title: American Tower to Buy Controlling Stake in Indian Cell Tower Company
text:
American Tower Corp. said it has agreed to buy a 51% stake in Indian cell tower owner Viom Networks Ltd. for 76 billion rupees ($1.2 billion) in a move to capitalize on booming smartphone usage.
Indian telecom provider Tata Teleservices Ltd. will keep part of its stake in Viom, though the companies didnâ€™t specify how much in a news release. SREI Infrastructure Finance Ltd. will divest its interest in Viom.
